title: Irukaanna Iduppirukaana Ilaiyaana Lyrics Nanban Songs lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Viijay Prakash, Javed Ali, Sunidhi Chauhan
Song: Irukaanna Iduppirukaana
 Movie: Nanban
Music : Harris Jeyaraj
Lyrics : Pa VIjay

Irukkaana idupirukkaana Illaiyaanaa illieana ?
Un idai thaana inbakk kadaithaana
mellidai thaandi udaithaana !!!

ada ikkani mukkani mugadu
naan thuthaanaaga thagadu
un udhattukul ethaanai udhadu
onnu koduk kodu

Adi anjagam anjagam mayilu
nee kanjanjanga rail-u
un iduppe aaraam viralu, ne gilu gilu..

Olli belly jelly belly malli
vaasam malli un maeni vengala velli
Solli solli unna alli killi
kannam killi vizhayaada vandhavan gilli...

Olli belly jelly belly malli
vaasam malli en maeni vengala velli
Solli solli enna alli killi
kannam killi vizhayaada vandhavan gilli...

Oruvaati idupaadi
malai yerakkathula thalla
Edangaati padangaati
enna arakka paraaka vandhu kolla

Adangaati madangaati
vaai oraikka oraikka muththam vaiyaen
Padangaati bayangaati
nenju yeraika yeraika thappu seiyyen

Naan chinna payyan ..ayya
Nee kanna vaiyyaen ..ayya
nee sonna seiven-- vaa vaa vayyen...

Olli belly jelly belly malli
vaasam malli un maeni vengala velli
Solli solli enna alli killi
kannam killi vizhayaada vandhavan gilli...

Laichaana laichaana
idha lavanga lavanga kadichaana
Inichaana inichaana
vaai manalil kadalil thinichaana

Molukkaana molukkaana
nalla pazhuthu pazhuthu thalukkaana
Idaichaana kolzhchaana
romba sedhukki sedhuki olachaana

Nee cheekishthaana !!, ini un kiss thaana ?
naan mangose thaana !!, un kaiyil kazhakasthaana

Labakku Raani Labakku Raani kumbathu maganee
kalappiyaane kalappiyaane rakshalube be

Irukkaana idupirukkaana Illaiyaanaa illieana ?
Un idai thaana inbakk kadaithaana
mellidai thaandi udaithaana !!!

ada ikkani mukkani mugadu
naan thuthaanaaga thagadu
un udhattukul ethaanai udhadu
onnu koduk kodu

Adi anjagam anjagam mayilu
nee kanjanjanga rail-u
un iduppe aaraam viralu, ne gilu gilu..

Olli belly jelly belly malli
vaasam malli un maeni vengala velli
Solli solli enna alli killi
kannam killi vizhayaada vandhavan gilli...
